projects.name: FrontierZ Launcher
projects.description: Desktop application to link with existing game launcher system. QT Framework front end via Pyside6. Pulls server images, banners, install data from server owners endpoint. Also pulls RSS feed to host news/updates for server owners to user. Users can also add personal servers. Data hosted locally via SQLite3 implementation.

projects.name: IrrPortfolio
projects.description: ASP.NET Core MVC server hosting React SPA. User Auth/Identification via Duende Identity 4. Blog implementation via ____ to SQL database. Book review system stored in database with API calls to server. Mainpage pull github API to visualize personal data via ____ react library.

projects.name: RustPSM
projects.description: Vue based SPA website running on Node.js routes. Creates pages based on SteamAPI userdata calls, create an accessable store of data on a mongoDB database.

projects.name: IrrResume
projects.description: This resume is a JSONSchema wrapped by a REACT.js webpage that is then converted to PDF if needed by ___. Integrated into my portfolio website.

work.name: Campus Advantage
work.summary: Followed up with prospects via phone, email, and personal tours to close leases. Managed, scheduled, and hosted events for current residents. A resource for current residents to help with maintenance/emergency calls, questions/concerns, and mediate issues. Participated in and hosted advertising, tabeling, and other outreach for prospective clients.
highlights: Hundreds of Full Year Leases Completed
YTD Lease % increase upto 20% each year

other.name: WCStudios

other.name: CPA Shadow
other.description: Shadowed a CPA. Participating in meetings, completed bookkeeping tasks, and reviewed a business's finances
